full_text: Kyle bonus Kyle how important was this game to to you guys huge home-ice it's playoff hockey got to take advantage of your opportunities at home and coming off a big momentum when an emotional win on Friday it was important for us to be able to turn the page and get our emotions back up and get a huge one tonight now looking at your line the three of you Hill brick Barnes and yourself you have 15 points what's been the key to your guys success with the series we're just moving our feet and we're make trying to make the simple place honestly he'll be such a big body he really gives you a lot of different options because he just moves a stick and he's got about a nine foot six so it's a pretty easy target and you know he's a goal scorer he gets around the cage and he gets those dirty areas and he's got a great shot too as evidence on this first one how hot was his dick when you were touching it steaming I like this bar nice and easy got to play look at Lloyd he'll be just going then that great fundamentals right to the far post and banks it in and playing with Barney - that guy's got unbelievable vision so it's he's fun this is a team that doesn't quit you guys saw that again here at the end of the third period any any panic there when they got that third goal no that comes from just having an older group that team given D a ton of credit they played really really hard they play structured they play fast and that's a really good hockey team so for us to get to ones at home was huge and but again lots of credit to them they played as hard preparation heading into next week through three games in India yeah got a trailer bodies right and get some recovery Monday and then back to work there's still a lot a lot of work to done to be done the potential well at least the series the next three games are in Indy so we got to make sure we're ready because road hockey in the playoffs is even tougher thanks your time and good luck anytime Roger
